sentences: A decision on the basket of methodological issues is contained in the report of the AWG-KP to the COP/MOP ( FCCC/KP/AWG/2009/L.15 ).
On greenhouse gases, the draft decision presents options on the inclusion of new gases.
On common metrics, the draft decision provides options on the methodologies for calculating global warming potential of various gases.
On the 2006 IPCC Guidelines, the draft decision decides to use this as a reference for methodologies for estimating emissions from sources and removals by sinks.
On sectors/source categories, the draft decision contains bracketed text on the addition of new subcategories.
